description: Erection of changing pavilion including changing rooms, public toilets, fitness suite and multi-use rooms (D2 Use Class) . Erection of covered spectator grandstand. Improvements to floodlights. (Summary).
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be begun no later than the  expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the requirements of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
site_name: Development Site At Ashton Playing Fields
